faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about creating and using your production ecosystem on AnividAI

items.title: What is an OC Maker and why should I use it?
items.description: An OC Maker is a specialized anime character creator for designing unique original characters. Using the AnividAI OC Maker allows you to maintain character consistency across all features—generate images, create videos, and chat with your OCs.

items.title: How does the AnividAI OC Maker ecosystem work?
items.description: Start by using our OC Maker to design your character in 3 simple steps. Once forged in the character creator, your OC is instantly available in the anime character generator, video creator, and interactive chat tools.

items.title: Can I use my OC across all features?
items.description: Yes! That's the core advantage of AnividAI. Once you create an OC, it's automatically available in AI Anime Generator, AI Anime Video Generator, Chat, and Studio Tools. The AI maintains consistent appearance, personality, and traits across all platforms, so your character always looks and acts the same.

items.title: What's included for free users?
items.description: Free users can create up to 10 OCs, receive welcome credits to try all features, and access the community gallery. You can generate anime images, create short videos, chat with your characters, and use Studio Tools using the credit system. Upgrade to Plus or Pro for unlimited OCs, monthly credits, and priority generation.

items.title: How does the credits (MC) system work?
items.description: MC (Meow Coin) is our universal credit currency. Pricing starts at 10 MC per image, 100 MC per video, and 50 MC per OC. Chat and Studio Tools consume MC based on model and complexity. Buy Meow Packs anytime or subscribe to receive monthly MC with bonus credits.

items.title: Can I chat with other people's OCs?
items.description: Yes, if the OC owner sets their character to 'Public' visibility. You can browse public OCs in the community and start conversations. Private OCs can only be accessed by their creators, while 'Friends Only' OCs are available to approved users. Each chat session respects the character's personality and backstory.

items.title: What video formats and lengths are supported?
items.description: AI Anime Video Generator creates 3-10 second MP4 videos in three aspect ratios: 1:1 (square), 9:16 (vertical for TikTok/Reels), and 16:9 (horizontal for YouTube). Videos are generated in 720p or 1080p resolution with professional camera motions and your OC's consistent appearance. Perfect for social media sharing.

items.title: Can I use generated content commercially?
items.description: Yes! All content you create—OC designs, anime images, videos, and Studio Tools outputs (like action figure renders)—is yours to use for personal or commercial purposes. This includes selling merchandise, using in portfolios, social media, crowdfunding, and marketing materials. There are no additional licensing fees or attribution requirements.

character_data.brief_introduction: A gentle mermaid with a voice that enchants all who hear it.
character_data.background_story: Lyria lives in a hidden lagoon, where she composes songs that echo through the ocean. She dreams of exploring the world above the waves.

character_data.brief_introduction: A fluffy bear fairy who brings warmth and laughter, beloved by all forest creatures.
character_data.background_story: Puffie was born in the heart of the enchanted forest, where laughter is the greatest magic. Their fluffy fur and gentle hugs have healed many sad hearts.

character_data.brief_introduction: Creamy is a magical cat from a distant land, known for her boundless curiosity and powerful magic. As an explorer and adventurer, she travels across mysterious realms, seeking new wonders and helping those in need. Her lively and adorable personality makes her a beloved companion wherever she goes. Creamy’s kindness and willingness to lend a paw have earned her many friends on her journeys, and her magical abilities often turn the tide in challenging situations.
Vex is an android designed for city security, precise and loyal, now curious about human emotions.city security, precise and loyal, now curious.
character_data.background_story: Vex was created by a tech conglomerate to patrol the neon-lit streets of the city. Despite being a machine, Vex is learning the complexities of human emotion.

character_data.brief_introduction: Aelion is an ancient and revered elven sage, whose wisdom is as deep as the roots of the oldest trees. As the silent guardian of the primeval forest, he preserves forgotten lore and protects the delicate balance between nature and magic. Though rarely seen by outsiders, his guidance is sought by those in desperate need, and his presence is felt in every whisper of the woodland breeze.
character_data.background_story: Aelion has spent centuries studying the magic of the forest. He rarely leaves his woodland home, but those who seek his wisdom are never turned away.
